Message: The user completes the submission of the form
created pixel for shop is in pending mode. Would you please test and authorize? Thanks

To test and authorize your NewsBreak Pixel for Shopify, you can follow these steps:

1. Log into your NewsBreak Ad Manager and navigate to Tools > Event Management.
2. Choose Pixel as your tracking type, Shopify as the integration method, and specify your event type.
3. Once integrated, you can test it in Ad Manager or inform your account manager/operations team that the integration is complete. They can verify the integration and perform necessary tests for you!

For more detailed information on setting up custom pixels, please refer to this article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify). Let me know if you need further assistance!
